name: Raw Vegetables
benefits: Raw vegetables provide more orosensory stimulation than cooked, leading to greater satiety signals and reduced caloric intake. Eating vegetables earlier in the meal helps crowd out more calorie-dense foods. The crunchy texture and increased chewing time enhance fullness.
amount: Eat raw vegetables first, before other meal components

quotes: uncooked vegetables in general offer more orosensory stimulation
since vegetables represent the healthiest class of foods with the fewest calories, we should aim to eat them earlier in the meal
